detail.name: El Monterey Beef & Bean Burritos, 32 oz, 8 Count (Frozen)
detail.description: Enjoy the authentic taste of El Monterey Beef & Bean Burritos with family and friends anytime hunger strikes. Our frozen burritos are always made with real beef and beans, prepared with authentic spices and wrapped in an oven-baked tortilla made of flour. Burrito combinations are as endless as they are satisfying. With 9g of protein and zero trans fat, our beef and bean frozen burritos, flour tortilla-wrapped, are something you can feel good about serving. An easy meal to freeze, El Monterey is ready in just minutes. When it comes to ready-to-go meals that are loaded with beef, freezer meals from one of your favorite microwave burrito brands has what you need. Look for us wherever frozen food products are sold regularly. If you love delicious Mexican appetizers or enjoy the simplicity of easy-to-make packaged burritos, both at home and on the go, bask in the convenience of our frozen cheese, steak and rice burrito for a quick lunch or microwave lunch option. Skip the stress of meal prep with our frozen snacks and frozen appetizers that will be sure to keep you satisfied when you have a craving for a Mexican snack. Discover a variety of frozen, ready-made meals and freezer burritos from one of your favorite brands of burrito.
key_features: Always made with real beef and beans seasoned with authentic Mexican spices wrapped with a fresh oven baked flour tortilla that the whole family will enjoy
0 Grams of trans fat per serving and no artificial colors added
8-count 32 ounce full family pack, easy to prepare burritos in the oven or microwave, stuffed with 9 grams of protein per serving to keep you satisfied regularly for a quick lunch or easy dinner
Keep your freezer stocked with easy frozen meals regularly
At El Monterey, we promise to bring you the best Mexican food - ALWAYS
A family favorite, our burritos are perfect at home and on the go
El Monterey offers a variety of frozen food including burritos, chimichangas, taquitos, tamales, quesadillas and breakfast burritos that your whole family will enjoy

top_reviews.review_text:
very effective.  Notified when ready. Brought out and loaded into vehicle in drizzle of rain.  SodaPop cases slid on top of other bags, but no damage. 
Thank You.

I fix these with a can of chilli and garnish with shredded cheese , 2 of my granddaughters that I'm raising  absolutely love them and would eat them at Least 2/3 times a week if I cooked them that often. They totally Love them cooked that way.

top_reviews.review_title: Short a burrito 3 out of 10 times
top_reviews.review_text: I love these burritos, get them every grocery order. But it be nice not to get the amount on the bag more often. It's ridiculous, give me what I'm paying for

theae are not bad. i buy them as a quick and easy way to get something in my stomach when i do not have the time or will to cook.  They taste fine and are good with chalula hot sauce but it seems they keep getting smaller in size every year

top_reviews.review_title: A Big Disappointment and a Waste of Money
top_reviews.review_text: we used to always keep a bag in the freezer for a tasty and quick lunch or snack. It had been a while, like five years. So I thought I would like to have them in the freezer again. I was so disappointed. First of all, they shrunk, in length and girth. The flour tortilla was more like a pie crust. And there was maybe a spoonful or two of filling. Just awful. So next I tried one in the microwave instead of the toaster oven. That made the tortilla somehow slimy. And once again, hardly any filling. In the garbage the remaining "burritos" go.

The picture on the package looks great - lots of filling, mmm! Too bad that's not what's in the package. When mine was cut in pieces, there is only a smear of 'filling'; it's just a rolled-up tortilla with an overwhelming amount of spice - perhaps to hide the fact that there isn't enough filling to compete with the rolls of tortilla? I used to like these, but I'll have to find something else now.

Ordered these frozen burritos through Walmart for $4.56. Received through this vendor 2 weeks later- not frozen and 2 years out of date.  They charged me $15.99! 
Returned them to Walmart. Have not received my refund and on Walmarts site they show as being on their way.

These used to be good, plenty of ingredients now it's where is the beef. there's just enough ingredients to be called a burrito. It's all tortilla now. definitely not worth buying. I feel like I've wasted money.

El Monterey used to make good burritos 20 years ago. Not any more. This so-called beef and bean was filled with refried beans only. Not even a hint of beef. The seasoning consisted of salt and jalapeno juice. Really terrible.

top_reviews.review_title: No money coming from the sky!
top_reviews.review_text: Im really disappointed!!! This item never was received!!! And this is not the first time the I have item missing or opened like bread in the order before this order no deserve even one star, the administration in Walmart in Live oak Florida is  not concerned about the situation? MAYBE but may money comes from a social security check! No from the sky

directions.name: Instructions
directions.value: Microwave (1,100 watt microwave) 1 Min. 15 Sec. frozen. Setting: High. Place 1 burrito on microwave-safe plate. Frozen: 1 minute, 15 seconds. Additional units add: 1 minuteLet product stand 30 seconds before eating. Oven: Preheat oven to 375⁰F. Place burritos on baking sheet with 1" between burritos . Bake uncovered. Frozen: 23 minutes. Let product stand 1 minute before eating.

directions.name: Safe Handling Instructions
directions.value: For food safety and quality, internal product temperature must reach 161° F. Since ovens vary, cooking times may require adjusting. *CAUTION: PRODUCT MAY BE HOT.*

ingredients.name: Ingredients
ingredients.value: Water, Enriched Wheat Flour (Enriched with Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Beef, Beans, Vegetable Oil (Soybean, Canola, Palm and/or Corn Oil), Contains 2% or Less Textured Vegetable Protein (Soy Flour, Caramel Color), Isolated Pea Product, Salt, Chili Pepper, Dough Conditioners (Yeast, Wheat Gluten, Sugar, Guar Gum, Food Starch, Sodium Metabisulfite), Spices, Flavor, Savory Flavor (Yeast Extract, Soy Sauce (Wheat, Soybeans, Salt), Maltodextrin, Lactic Acid, Calcium Lactate, Salt).

specifications.name: Features
specifications.value: Family pack, Microwavable, 0 grams trans fat per serving
